amendment.description: To provide amounts to support innovative, utility-administered energy efficiency programs for small businesses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 816 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 816 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6650; text: CR S6650) To provide amounts to support innovative, utility-administered energy efficiency programs for small businesses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 816 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 816 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 738.
